title: Labeling Young Children With 'Word Gap' Language Is Harmful
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Education - Today 
When high school student Coby Burren noticed slaves referred to as "immigrant workers" in his Texas textbook, he called his mother who then ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
